Colors.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#colors).

Fonts.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#fonts).

font_base_size.name: Font base size
font_base_size.help: Allows to define the size of the fonts for the theme.

Design.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#design).

theme_store_name.name: Store name
theme_store_name.help: Allows to replace the original 'Store name' in the 'Header', 'Footer' and 'Mobile Menu', which will be the one defined at 'Settings > General > Preferences'. This will not display if a Logo has been uploaded in those sections.

theme_store_name_size.name: Store name size
theme_store_name_size.help: Allows to define the size of the 'Store name'. Size will vary depending on the section where it's displayed.

theme_store_name_weight.name: Store name weight
theme_store_name_weight.help: Allows to define the font weight of the 'Store name'.

theme_corners_style.name: Corners style
theme_corners_style.help: Choose the corner style that sections and components of the theme will have. This affects elements like Slides, Banners, Images, Category blocks, Product blocks, Accordions, among others.

theme_button_style.name: Buttons style
theme_button_style.help: Choose which style of button you would like to use in the store. This also affects items of the Store's Header and Navbar.

theme_icon_style.name: Icons style
theme_icon_style.help: Allows to define the style for the icons across the theme.

theme_icon_cart.name: Cart icon
theme_icon_cart.help: Allows to define the icon of 'Cart' that will be used across the theme.

theme_icon_cart_button.name: Show Cart icon in buttons
theme_icon_cart_button.help: Allows to define if the 'Cart' icon will be displayed on the 'Add to Cart' button visible on 'Product blocks' and in the 'Product page'.

Wishlist.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#wishlist).

Breadcrumbs.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#breadcrumbs).

Headings.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#headings).

heading_align_desktop.name: Desktop alignment
heading_align_desktop.help: Allows to define the alignment for desktop devices.

heading_align_mobile.name: Mobile alignment
heading_align_mobile.help: Allows to define the alignment for desktop devices.

heading_description_size.name: Description size
heading_description_size.help: Size of the description that shows after a title in the theme.

heading_title_size.name: Titles size
heading_title_size.help: Size of all the Titles of the theme, such as the ones that can be found in Components, Category, Product and Pages. The size of title will vary depending on the 'Font Base Size' that is defined.

heading_title_weight.name: Titles weight
heading_title_weight.help: Allows to define the weight of all the Titles of the theme. To know more about how each weight numerical values are converted, check [this article](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/font-weight#common_weight_name_mapping).

heading_title_spacing.name: Titles letter spacing
heading_title_spacing.help: Allows to define the space between letters for all Titles in the theme.

Filters.help: Available only for Premium Plan or above. For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#filters).

filters_behavior.name: Apply filters on click
filters_behavior.help: This will only be applied on Desktop devices.

filters_counter.name: Show counter of products by filter

filters_limit.name: Limit amount of filters items
filters_limit.help: Allows to limit the amount of visible items within each filter group.

filters_limit_amount.name: Amount of visible items
filters_limit_amount.help: Number of visible items within each filter group.

Product block.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#product-block).

pb_name_weight.name: Name weight
pb_name_weight.help: Allows to define the font weight of the name of the products.

pb_show_buttons_hover.name: Show add to cart button on hover

pb_price_from_until.name: Show 'from/until' text for variants
pb_price_from_until.help: Allows to display a text for products where variant's prices may vary.

Product form.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#product-form).

show_available_stock_tag.name: Show available tag for Product Stock

pf_status_out_of_stock_text.name: 'Out of stock' message text
pf_status_out_of_stock_text.default: This product has run out of stock. You may send us an inquiry about it.

pf_status_not_available_text.name: 'Not available' message text
pf_status_not_available_text.default: This product is currently unavailable. You may send us an inquiry about it.

pf_buy_now_button.name: Enable 'Buy now' button
pf_buy_now_button.help: It displays a button to redirect your clients directly to the checkout after adding to the cart.

pf_buy_now_button_main.name: Set 'Buy now' button as main
pf_buy_now_button_main.help: If it's enabled, the 'Buy now' button will be placed before 'Add to cart button'.

pf_buy_now_button_hide_disabled.name: Hide 'Buy now' button when disabled
pf_buy_now_button_hide_disabled.help: Makes the 'Buy now' button to be automatically hidden when the action is not possible to perform.

WhatsApp button.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#whatsapp-button).

Add to cart notification.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#add-to-cart-notification).

display_cart_notification.name: Enable notification
display_cart_notification.help: Displays a message on the page notifying customers that the product was added to the cart. Overrides redirection options in your checkout preferences.

cart_notification_position.name: Notification position
cart_notification_position.help: Allows selecting if the notification will be displayed at the 'top' or 'bottom' of the browser, on the right side.

Age verification popup.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#age-verification-popup).

av_popup.name: Enable popup message
av_popup.help: If enabled, the message will be displayed in all theme pages.

av_popup_content.name: Text
av_popup_content.help: Here you can add the content for the message.
av_popup_content.default: You must be of legal age to view our website. Due to legal requirements you must verify your age.

av_popup_button_accept.name: Accept button
av_popup_button_accept.help: Text for the accept button. If visitors click this button, the message will not be displayed again.

av_popup_button_reject_redirect.name: Redirect link
av_popup_button_reject_redirect.help: Link to redirect visitors if they click the reject button.

Blog.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#blog).

blog_post_button.name: Display link button on blog posts

Shopping Process.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#shopping-process).

cart_success_message_text.name: Message text
cart_success_message_text.default: If you have any question about it or need help, send us an email:

cart_success_link.name: Message link
cart_success_link.help: Allows to display an email or link after the message text.

Custom codes.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#custom-codes).

head_code_top.name: Top <head> code
head_code_top.help: Embed code at the start of the <head> tag

head_code_bottom.name: Bottom <head> code
head_code_bottom.help: Embed code at the end of the <head> tag

body_code_top.name: Top <body> code
body_code_top.help: Embed code at the start of the <body> tag

body_code_bottom.name: Bottom <body> code
body_code_bottom.help: Embed code at the end of the <body> tag

Disable shopping features.help: For more information about this section and its options, please visit [this article](landing?url=support/theme-customization/#disable-shopping-features).

disable_shopping_cart_text.name: Disable shopping - Text
disable_shopping_cart_text.default: It's not possible to purchase products at the moment. If you need more information please contact us through our different channels.
